value: This memorial, constructed with the same earth from the cemetery, is designed to preserve the studied skeletal remains of the ancient inhabitants. The remains are placed in jars within the structure's holes, inscribed with a mosaic of the zoomorphic in top-down perspective. The monument aims to create a Vaccean memory area where, especially every November 1st (date of the Celtic Samhain), both recent (sashas) and ancient, forgotten Vacceans (zamanis) can be honored.
